5c9f20d5-8361-b331-9267-5303ca5b136a.living_situation: Lives in a suburban house with his wife and two adult children
5c9f20d5-8361-b331-9267-5303ca5b136a.family_summary: Andrés is married to Maria, and they have two children, Juan and Sofia, who are both in college.
5c9f20d5-8361-b331-9267-5303ca5b136a.communication_style: Prefers in-person consultations and values clear, direct communication with healthcare providers. Often brings a family member to appointments for support.
5c9f20d5-8361-b331-9267-5303ca5b136a.primary_motivation: To stay healthy and active for his family, especially to be a strong role model for his children.
5c9f20d5-8361-b331-9267-5303ca5b136a.barriers: Occasional language barriers and scheduling difficulties due to work commitments. Chronic pain sometimes limits his mobility.
5c9f20d5-8361-b331-9267-5303ca5b136a.support_system: His wife Maria is a strong support, along with his children who help with household tasks and accompany him to medical appointments when needed.

d545798e-09a4-ef89-abc5-9f62dc5a5095.living_situation: Lives alone in a cozy apartment
d545798e-09a4-ef89-abc5-9f62dc5a5095.family_summary: Comes from a close-knit family with parents still residing in Nantucket; has one younger brother who she talks to regularly.
d545798e-09a4-ef89-abc5-9f62dc5a5095.communication_style: Prefers clear, concise information and appreciates when doctors offer actionable steps; values empathy and patience.
d545798e-09a4-ef89-abc5-9f62dc5a5095.primary_motivation: Wants to maintain a healthy lifestyle to support her new journey into motherhood and to be active and present for her child.
d545798e-09a4-ef89-abc5-9f62dc5a5095.barriers: Struggles with stress management and occasionally feels overwhelmed balancing work and personal life; limited social interactions can make it difficult to build a support network.
d545798e-09a4-ef89-abc5-9f62dc5a5095.support_system: Relies on her family for emotional support and has a close friend who lives nearby; also participates in online forums for expectant mothers.

eed8a921-eac8-0778-4113-255f4e35506a.living_situation: Lives alone in a small apartment in Boston, MA
eed8a921-eac8-0778-4113-255f4e35506a.family_summary: Widowed, with one adult daughter who lives out of state. No siblings, and parents have passed away.
eed8a921-eac8-0778-4113-255f4e35506a.communication_style: Prefers face-to-face communication and appreciates when healthcare providers explain things clearly and patiently. Values empathy and understanding.
eed8a921-eac8-0778-4113-255f4e35506a.primary_motivation: Desire to stay healthy to maintain her independence and be active in her local community garden.
eed8a921-eac8-0778-4113-255f4e35506a.barriers: Limited social contact and occasional feelings of loneliness, which sometimes affect her motivation. Financial constraints due to living on a fixed income.
eed8a921-eac8-0778-4113-255f4e35506a.support_system: Her daughter, who checks in regularly by phone and visits occasionally. A close friend from her local community garden who offers companionship and support.

3c4b499b-090b-c6fa-28d7-b56c6056d0a2.living_situation: Lives with her husband in a cozy bungalow in South Yarmouth, MA
3c4b499b-090b-c6fa-28d7-b56c6056d0a2.family_summary: Married for over 50 years with two grown children and three grandchildren who visit often
3c4b499b-090b-c6fa-28d7-b56c6056d0a2.communication_style: Prefers face-to-face communication with a personal touch, values clear explanations and written summaries
3c4b499b-090b-c6fa-28d7-b56c6056d0a2.primary_motivation: Staying healthy to enjoy quality time with her grandchildren and continue her passion for gardening
3c4b499b-090b-c6fa-28d7-b56c6056d0a2.barriers: Mobility issues due to osteoarthritis and stress related to balancing work and health appointments
3c4b499b-090b-c6fa-28d7-b56c6056d0a2.support_system: Her husband, children, and a close-knit group of friends from a local book club

5393ea7f-1fea-4064-9df4-460a2f662d07.living_situation: Lives in a suburban house with his wife
5393ea7f-1fea-4064-9df4-460a2f662d07.family_summary: Married to his college sweetheart; no children
5393ea7f-1fea-4064-9df4-460a2f662d07.communication_style: Prefers direct and detailed communication, appreciates written summaries
5393ea7f-1fea-4064-9df4-460a2f662d07.primary_motivation: Wants to improve his health to enjoy retirement traveling with his wife
5393ea7f-1fea-4064-9df4-460a2f662d07.barriers: Struggles with social isolation and managing stress, which affects his alcohol consumption
5393ea7f-1fea-4064-9df4-460a2f662d07.support_system: His wife is his primary support, along with a close-knit group of college friends who stay in touch virtually
